item.title: EP 77 - .TGA Greyspacing
item.itunes:title: .TGA Greyspacing
item.description:
Today we search for the scariest movie ever made, recommend a horror classic, and try to decipher the meaning of an internet mystery.

Patreon
https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

MERCH STORE!!!
https://tinyurl.com/y8zam4o2

What is the scariest movie ever made? I believe there is a movie out there that is so terrifying that it could drive you mad. If it exists, will anyone ever see it?

Then we take a quick look at one of my favorite horror films: "In The Mouth Of Madness."

Then we try to unravel the mystery of .TGA Greyspacing. A long-time item that predates most modern Iceberg Conspiracy memes, what is the meaning of this phrase. Could it possibly be a way to communicate with supernatural forces around us? And it it is, is there a way to shut it off?

Links:

Why Natives Kept Long Hair, Spiritual Power of Long Hair

http://awakeningtimes.com/why-natives-kept-long-hair-spiritual-power-of-long-hair/

Why Black People Need Conspiracy Theories

https://www.complex.com/life/2016/10/black-conspiracy-theories

D.C. Councilman Apologizes for Claiming That Jews Control the Weather

http://nymag.com/daily/intelligencer/2018/03/dc-councilman-apologizes-for-saying-jews-control-the-weather.html

Cinema Of The Unsettling

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Yn8IarLVTnM

In The Mouth Of Madness

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AlugldzO9zY

.TGA Greyspacing

https://8ch.net/x/res/29633.html

The Brain Made Simple

http://brainmadesimple.com/thalamus.html

Thalamogeniculate artery

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thalamogeniculate_artery

Thalamus, Functions of Thalamus, Anatomy, Clinical significance Thalamus

https://www.medicosite.com/thalamus-functions-of-thalamus-anatomy-of-thalamus/

Thalamus

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thalamus

Gray space

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gray_space

Greyspacing

https://books.google.com/books?id=NPaoCgAAQBAJ&pg=PT175&lpg=PT175&dq=greyspacing&source=bl&ots=dw6mb4nGQC&sig=VFQBF22Z_XcdjtmoTQaFDN6XfXY&hl=en&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjCns3z0qzdAhUJz1MKHXb0BEsQ6AEwDXoECAIQAQ#v=onepage&q=greyspacing&f=false

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black
Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"
Closing Song: "Bella Royale"
Music By Dr. Huxxxtable
Hood River

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @DeadRabbitRadio

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018 - 2021
